sql.id: allColumns_認定調査票概況調査サービスの状況

mapper.sql: CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND Q."remban" = 1 AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 訪問介護ホームヘルプ, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND Q."remban" = 2 AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 訪問入浴介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND Q."remban" = 3 AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 訪問看護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND Q."remban" = 4 AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 訪問リハビリテーション, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 5 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 居宅療養管理指導, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 6 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 通所介護デイサービス, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 7 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 通所リハビリテーションデイケア, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 8 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 短期入所生活介護ショートステイ, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 9 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 短期入所療養介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 10 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 特定施設入居者生活介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 11 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 福祉用具貸与, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 12 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 特定福祉用具販売, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 13 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 夜間対応型訪問介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 14 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 認知症対応型通所介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 15 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 小規模多機能型居宅介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 16 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 認知症対応型共同生活介護グループホーム, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 17 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 地域密着型特定施設入居者生活介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 18 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 地域密着型介護老人福祉施設入所者生活介護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 19 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 定期巡回随時対応型訪問介護看護, CASE WHEN A."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" = '09B' AND #{総合事業開始区分} ='1' AND Q."remban" = 20 THEN Q."serviceJokyo" END AS 看護小規模多機能型居宅介護
